results.title: Spin bowling
results.creator_credit: Denys Parsons, Brian Smith, Dorothy Grayson and Realist Films
results.brief_description: Analyses the action of English and Essex bowler, Peter Smith, in producing the leg break and off break. Includes close-up shots of his hand demonstrating the spin he imparts to the ball. On an indoor pitch H.P. Crabtree explains Smith’s action further by use of a mechanically propelled ball.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Denys Parsons, Brian Smith, Dorothy Grayson and Realist Films

results.title: Spiders
results.brief_description: The life-cycle of the nursery-web spider and habits and characteristics of the orb-web, funnel-web and trap-door spiders. A microscopic study of a spiral web, and close-ups of its spinning, together with scenes of spiders attacking, stinging and ensnaring insects are shown.

results.title: Spider
results.creator_credit: Kyle Neaves, Neill S. Bell and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
results.brief_description: Charts a man’s gradual progress into obsession with catching the spiders that he discovers have infested his basement. Shot using the latest miniature camera technology, the story is told through the eyes of a spider.

results.title: Speedball for girls
results.brief_description: An introduction to the game of speedball. Explains players’ positions on the field, the rules of the game, techniques in developing team co-operation and individual skills - kicking, juggling, volleying, passing and receiving.

results.title: Speed the scrap [Short version]
results.creator_credit: Frank Green, Ace Films and British Iron and Steel Federation
results.brief_description: Emphasises the fact the Britain is becoming more dependent upon scrap metal to maintain her output of iron and steel. Iron ore deposits in the Midlands and imported ore from Africa provide insufficient supplies for new steel; over half the iron and steel produced in the United Kingdom is made from scrap. shows conversion of scrap to new steel in electric carbon-arc furnaces; by-product of process is slag, used as fertiliser.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Frank Green, Ace Films and British Iron and Steel Federation
results.description: Emphasises the fact the Britain is becoming more dependent upon scrap metal to maintain her output of iron and steel. results.title: Speed the plough
results.creator_credit: Bob Privett, Allan Crich, British Petroleum and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
